103  robotDynamicsData()
104  {
105  //initialize the variable size. Hardcoding the size for now
106  //3 DOF per leg * 4 leg = 12 DOF total
107  //initialize to zero for easy computation of average value
108  joint_q_ = Eigen::VectorXd::Zero(12);
109  joint_q_dot_ = Eigen::VectorXd::Zero(12);
110  joint_torque_ = Eigen::VectorXd::Zero(12);
111  //resize the ring buffer
112  joint_q_buffer_.resize(MAX_DATA_BUFFER_SIZE);
113  joint_q_dot_buffer_.resize(MAX_DATA_BUFFER_SIZE);
114  joint_torque_buffer_.resize(MAX_DATA_BUFFER_SIZE);
115  }
